content: Apple VP Deirdre O'Brien sent a video to retail staff acknowledging that this has been a uniquely challenging time but that store NPS is the highest it’s been. She also said the company has a “wide range of mental health resources” on the People Site. She announced…1/

content.html: PSA: Do not use EAP therapy resources. This is some of the legislation we are working on in Washington... hopefully federally. @chelseyglasson brought it to light that Google is using her EAP therapy notes against her... and the fact that they had access at all is alarming.
content.value:
PSA:

Do not use EAP therapy resources.

This is some of the legislation we are working on in Washington... hopefully federally.

@chelseyglasson brought it to light that Google is using her EAP therapy notes against her... and the fact that they had access at all is alarming.
